thread.title: Need a Modeller for some Model Creation

post.author: Morte
post.body:
Ok guys, I have a question for the community,

Would someone like to edit the Standard Marine Walker model to create new walkers based on a class system (i.e. support walker would have double missile racks) I need this for my mod im working on, I would grant the author some artistic license when making said models, as well as having a huge thank you to, becuase i cant model for...well you know

give it a think and if more than one person wants to do it, well thanks, the more the merrier
